overview: The city of Athens in an enchantingly surpising and self-referential deciption: the streets, the buildings and the people speak amid a newly established freedom and refer back to Liaropoulos' two previous films: A Letter from Charleroi (1965) and Athens, City of Smiles (1967). Liaropoulos writes a personal but universal letter, showcasing the city's most beautiful facets.
title: The Other Letter
